MS MCQs

    Troubleshoot mail flow with Exchange Online - Summary and knowledge check

    »

    1. What’s the easiest way to test if a user is having issues with their mail client?

      Connect to Exchange Online by using a different email client

      Delete and recreate their account

      Run Microsoft Support and Recovery Assistant


    2. By default, how far back does a message trace search?

      One day

      Two days

      Seven days


    3. Which class of user is the newest style non-delivery report aimed at?

      Only email administrators

      Only email users

      Both email administrators and users


    4. Which do audit logs track?

      Errors caused by users

      Issues caused by malware

      Changes made by admins


    5. Where do you find reports to monitor usage, security, and compliance for Exchange Online?

      In the Microsoft 365 admin center

      On client devices

      In the /reports folder on the Exchange Online server
